BLDP In the Chinese market Ballards product sales in China did not meet expectations in 2018 but it is working to improve this situation by working with new partners In May it announced an order agreement with Weichai Balad Hydrogen Technology Co Ltd for a total value of approximately US44 million which will provide a series of fuel cell components for fuel cell stack assembly After the fuel cell module is assembled at the Weichai Ballard joint venture it will be sold to Weichai Power Co Ltd to support Weichais initial deployment commitment to provide at least 2000 fuel cell modules for commercial fuel cell vehicles in China All products and components offered by Ballard and related application engineering support will be based on Ballards nextgeneration LCS stack technology and are planned for delivery in 2019 and 2020 In the North American market Ballard expects the California FCEV market to be more active in 2019 httpwwwescncomcnnewsshow740860html
